entries.jobDescription: Master thesis project exploring how the world can be recreated in 3D using satellite imagery and deep learning. From an input satellite image, the novel deep neural network predicts a semantic segmentation map, a boundary proximity signed heatmap and a heightmap. These three outputs can be combined with the input image in different ways to produce a 3D model of any arbitrary format.
Development of a new, lightweight web application allowing quality control of complex GIS-datasets and visualisation of drone-captured video sequences.
Teaching and examining students in three different laboratory sessions in the course Programming in C++.
Teaching and examining students in three different laboratory sessions in the course Introduction to Programming.
Reception with responsibility of sales, customer service, administration of memberships and booking of pools, group training and other facilities, lifeguard duties.
